message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $16,000. I believe it will be incredibly valuable for you, even more so than the initial asking price.
I'm really interested in the product, but $16,000 is a bit out of my budget. I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000
I understand your position, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $14,000?
I'm getting close to my budget, but I still think $14,000 is a bit steep. How about we meet at $13,000?
